topic.title: How can I restore my zeroID ?
topic.body:
I was fucked by some torjan and my users.jason seems to be embedding some bad code,
it there a way for me to restore the zeroID? May be to write a new users.json with privatekey in?

1584867258_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body: @ssdifnskdjfnsdjk     hi  Sorry I am fucked with the torjan , I saw every html files were embedding in to these code "DropFileName = "svchost.exe""  and what should I do?

> [gitcenter](#comment_1342_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Hm, perhaps /cc @styromaniac should add the site to MOAB if the site owner doesn't reply soon

I am the developer .This is my shadow ID .Tell me what should I do for the torjan?

PS. I am worried about my users.jason probablly embedding some malicious <script code and register a new ID.

> [gitcenter](#comment_1347_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Just remove the dangerous code from index.html. There might be some problem with JavaScript though, I'd recommend you to copy the all.js contents from the official ZeroTalk 

OK I will try. BTW, now my site still be downloadable?http://127.0.0.1:43110/13aPrVQJnVodMYi6cJR7ZUHoNtp7zFGUPB          ? tell me
